game.name: Company of Heroes 2
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 멀티플레이어, PvP, 온라인 PvP, 협동, 온라인 협동, Steam 도전 과제, Steam 트레이딩 카드, Steam 창작마당, Steam Cloud, 통계, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Experience the ultimate WWII RTS platform with COH2 and its standalone expansions. This package includes the base game, which you can then upgrade by purchasing The Western Front Armies, Ardennes Assault and/or The British Forces. More info in the "About This Game" section below.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Experience the ultimate WWII RTS platform with COH2 and its standalone expansions. This package includes the base game, which you can then upgrade by purchasing The Western Front Armies, Ardennes Assault and/or The British Forces. More info in the "About This Game" section below.
game.developers: Relic Entertainment, Feral Interactive (Mac), Feral Interactive (Linux)
game.publishers: Relic Entertainment, Feral Interactive (Mac), Feral Interactive (Linux)

reviewHighlights.text: ㄹㅇ 이게임은 이제 고인물만 남아서 뉴비가 살아남기 힘듬 그리고 컴까기에서 서로 팀탓하는 능지 처참한놈들이 졸라많음... (물론 집앞 캠핑맨이나.. 박격포충.. 캐쉬충은.. 컴까기에서도 좀 빡이 치긴함)
컴오히3 보단 확실히 낫음 ㅇㅇ..... 좋다는게 아니라
